name: Bear's Flower (Shumary)
description:
This game was developed by the entire team joint efforts while participating in the “Ludum Dare 50” and “Indicator” gaming community jam.

Graphics, sounds and music were created by the members of the game team. Some sounds were taken from free sources: «Burgh Records», «WAVlist.com», «Alan McKinney’s library», «Daruma Audio».
